segments.text: You are going to be really jealous when you find out where I ’ m headed for the holidays !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t tell me ! I ’ m sure it ’ s someplace warm and sunny with great beaches !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got it ! I ’ m going to spend two fabulous weeks in Hawaii !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so lucky ! Send me a postcard !
segments.speaker: S2
